Uses of Class
org.jsimpledb.core.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    org.jsimpledb.cli
    JSimpleDB Command Line Interface (CLI) classes.
    org.jsimpledb.core
    Core classes for the JSimpleDB Java persistence layer.
